bibl.title: P. Petra Inv. 10 and Its Arabic.
bibl.note: Preliminary presentation of P. Petra Inv. 10. Division of inherited property among three brothers, between AD 527 and 537. Discusses in part. the Arabic toponyms.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I

bibl.seg: DANIEL Robert W., P. Petra Inv. 10 and Its Arabic.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 331-341, 1 carte.
Preliminary presentation of P. Petra Inv. 10. Division of inherited property among three brothers, between AD 527 and 537. Discusses in part. the Arabic toponyms.
